data.name: Hammerground
data.detailed_description:
Hammerground is a virtual reality tabletop game, it's a mix of a whack-a-mole-like arcade and a tower defense.

  • randomly generated enemies;
  • countdown timer;
  • a lot of fun.

This game is designed exclusively for Virtual Reality.

VR Controllers are required to play Hammerground.
